questions.question: What are blocks in the blockchain technology?
questions.answer: Blockchain consists of N number of blocks. A block is nothing but just a group of transactions. When these groups are combined with each other, they are known as blockchain.

questions.question: What is a double spend?
questions.answer: A double spend is an attack where the given set of coins is spent in more than one transaction.

questions.question: What kind of cryptographic system does blockchain use to secure the legder?
questions.answer: Asymmetric cryptography, also known as public key cryptography.  Aymmetric cryptography uses public and private keys to encrypt and decrypt data.

questions.question: What is a genesis block?
questions.answer: A genesis block is the first block of a block chain
